name: Retro Rangers
description:
You are the commander who manages the "Retro Rangers" !
Get, heal and train Rangers to run your company!
They will save the future earth.

Something Cool
▶ Contents including management, strategy, and simulation!
▶ You can be stronger with the Legend heroes and runes.
▶ Play with many heroes, runes, and passive items!
▶ Your mission is to plan the Earth Peace Project.
